name: Angie S
comment: Chat GPS is lowkey a lifesaver, its good for the long answers chat gpt gives

name: Koji Mon
comment: things i never knew i needed

name: Maxim Mogilevskiy
comment: It's amazing! This is exactly what I've been wanting for so long. Kudos to the author.

name: Siddique K
comment: this extension really very helpful to navigate between previous prompts, thanks to the developerðŸŽ‰

name: Gabe Shires
comment: So useful for those long conversations with chat gpt

name: Jeff Kang
comment: Thanks a lot for your work on this extension! I recently found the Web Highlights extension that highlights and bookmarks a position on a long ChatGPT prompt. I think this ChatGPT ScrollMap will complement the other extension well, as I scroll more easier to find what I want to highlight.

name: Farc Koog
comment: Great tool, just has little bugs when you are using it in dark mode. The user 'Roman Vus' described exactly the same problem that I had. It seems to me that the athor of the tool need to make a nice design for dark mode cases

name: Roma Vus
comment: The idea by it self is so great but there is a few butgs in the extention. I will just inform you of the bugs I found. I use dark theme, and on the dark theme, the minimap is white and the text is white, so it is a bit hard to see what is going on. Also, after a while, it starts to slow down and freeze a bit. I really like this idea and, to be honest, for my jobe, I would add a minimap to browser, but it is probably too complicated and the browsers might not allow to do that.
